data.lyric:
[ti:More Hearts Than Mine]
[ar:Ingrid Andress]
[al:More Hearts Than Mine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]More Hearts Than Mine - Ingrid Andress
[00:03.19]Lyrics by：Ingrid Andress/Sam Ellis/Derrick Southerland
[00:06.38]I can't wait to show you where I grew up
[00:12.06]Walk you around the foothills of my town
[00:17.32]Probably feel like you've been there before
[00:21.02]After hearing all the stories I've been telling you
[00:26.12]For six months now
[00:29.79]We'll probably have to sleep in separate bedrooms
[00:35.76]Pack a shirt for church because we'll go
[00:41.75]I'm not trying to scare you off but
[00:44.83]I just thought that we should talk a few things out
[00:48.81]Before we hit the road
[00:53.00]If I bring you home to mama
[00:56.46]I guess I'd better warn ya
[00:59.29]She falls in love a little faster than I do
[01:04.68]And my dad will check your tyres
[01:07.83]Pour you whiskey over ice and
[01:10.97]Take you fishing but pretend that he don't like you
[01:17.17]If we break up
[01:19.50]I'll be fine
[01:22.46]But you'll be breaking more hearts than mine
[01:32.14]My sister's gonna ask a million questions
[01:37.83]Say anything she can to turn you red
[01:43.83]And when you meet my high school friends
[01:46.84]They'll buy you drinks and fill you in
[01:49.65]On all the crazy nights I can't outlive
[01:54.95]So if I bring you home to mama
[01:58.60]I guess I'd better warn ya
[02:01.40]She falls in love a little faster than I do
[02:06.90]And my dad will check your tyres
[02:10.11]Pour you whiskey over ice and
[02:13.23]Buy you dinner but pretend that he don't like you
[02:19.31]If we break up
[02:21.92]I'll be fine
[02:24.59]But you'll be breaking more hearts than mine
[02:42.65]If I bring you home to mama
[02:45.97]I guess I'd better warn ya
[02:48.89]She feels every heartache I go through
[02:54.38]And if my dad sees me crying
[02:57.36]He'll pour some whiskey over ice and
[03:00.63]Tell a lie and say he never really liked you
[03:06.72]If we break up
[03:09.20]I'll be fine
[03:12.09]But you'll be breaking more hearts than mine
[03:18.23]You'll be breaking more hearts than mine
data.trans:
[ti:More Hearts Than Mine]
[ar:Ingrid Andress]
[al:More Hearts Than Mine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.19]//
[00:06.38]我迫不及待想要让你看看我长大的地方
[00:12.06]带你转一转我家乡的小山
[00:17.32]你可能觉得以前来过这里
[00:21.02]在你听完我跟你讲的故事以后
[00:26.12]到现在已经六个月了
[00:29.79]我们或许不能睡在同一间卧室里
[00:35.76]带一件去教堂穿的衣服吧 我们可能会去教堂
[00:41.75]我不是要吓你 但是
[00:44.83]我觉得有些事情应该事先说清楚
[00:48.81]然后再上路
[00:53.00]如果我带你回家见我妈妈
[00:56.46]我最好还是提醒你一下
[00:59.29]她比我更容易爱上别人
[01:04.68]我的爸爸会帮你检查轮胎
[01:07.83]给你倒加冰的威士忌
[01:10.97]带你去钓鱼 但是装作不喜欢你
[01:17.17]如果我们分手了
[01:19.50]我倒没什么
[01:22.46]但你伤害的人 将不止我一个
[01:32.14]我的姐姐会问各种问题
[01:37.83]想方设法让你脸红
[01:43.83]等你见到我的高中同学
[01:46.84]他们会请你喝酒 把你灌醉
[01:49.65]那些疯狂的夜晚 我难以忘怀
[01:54.95]所以 如果我带你回家见我妈妈
[01:58.60]我最好还是提醒你一下
[02:01.40]她比我更容易爱上别人
[02:06.90]我的爸爸会帮你检查轮胎
[02:10.11]给你倒加冰的威士忌
[02:13.23]请你吃晚饭 但是装作不喜欢你
[02:19.31]如果我们分手了
[02:21.92]我倒没什么
[02:24.59]但你伤害的人 将不止我一个
[02:42.65]如果我带你回家见我妈妈
[02:45.97]我最好还是提醒你一下
[02:48.89]她能感受到我的每一次心痛
[02:54.38]如果我爸爸看见我哭
[02:57.36]他会倒点加冰的威士忌
[03:00.63]撒谎说他从没喜欢过你
[03:06.72]如果我们分手了
[03:09.20]我倒没什么
[03:12.09]但你伤害的人 将不止我一个
[03:18.23]你伤害的人 将不止我一个
